mapviews

类 BasicInfoView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

              • mapviews.BasicInfoView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class BasicInfoView
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    This is a view class to show basic information of game.

    When player save their map in mapEditor, this is the basic information of new map

    另请参阅:
    JDialog, 序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BasicInfoView

        public BasicInfoView(RiskMapModel map,
                     int checkWarning,
                     int mode)
        Constructor of class.

        configuring GUI of the class

        参数:
        map - Object of RiskMap
        checkWarning - return value of mapelements.RiskMap#checkWarnings(), to indicate warnings related to the 5 basic information
        mode - Indicator, affect size of the GUI
        另请参阅:
        RiskMapModel.checkWarnings()
